thread.title: Tennessee bench player celebrates a dunk so hard he falls and splits his pants
thread.title_full: Tennessee bench player celebrates a dunk so hard he falls and splits his pants

author: Mark Sandritter
title: Tennessee bench player celebrates a dunk so hard he falls and splits his pants
text:
Worth it!
Led by a 25-point game from Robert Hubbs III, the Tennessee Volunteers upset No. 4 Kentucky on Tuesday. The only downside of Hubbs’ performance is one Tennessee player needs a new pair of pants.
The @Vol_Hoops upset is brewing. https://t.co/8EAlilIqFP pic.twitter.com/Thrir8Xcwn 
— SEC Network (@SECNetwork) January 25, 2017 Check out the player on the bench who enthusiastically jumps in the air to celebrate, only to fail at sticking the landing. Not only did he go down, but As he does, you can see that his pants split.
That could be a very embarrassing moment, but when it’s part of beating the No. 4 team in the country, it’s totally worth it.
